Linux-Cylon
===========
 1. cd ${WORKSPACE}
 2. . CommandScripts/LinuxTools/SetCylonEnv.sh
 3. cd ~
 4. mkdir boost
 5. cd boost
 6. tar -xvjf ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_HOME}/boost/boost_1_68_0.tar.bz2
 7. cd boost_1_68_0
 8. sudo rsync -rlptDWv boost/ ${CROSS_COMPILE_FULL_HOST}/usr/include/boost/
 9. . ${COMMON_SCRIPT_HOME}/SetJenkinsEnvLinux.sh
10. ./bootstrap.sh --with-libraries=date_time,regex,system,log --prefix=/usr
11. Edit project-config.jam.  Replace "using gcc ;" with
      "using gcc : arm : arm-angstrom-linux-gnueabi-g++ ;"
12. . ${COMMON_SCRIPT_HOME}/SetCylonEnv.sh
13. ./b2 variant=release link=shared threading=multi
14. cp stage/lib/libboost*.so.1.68.0 ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_LIB_PATH_RELEASE}
15. Add/update the new library files in to the TFS.
16. The local ~/boost directory can now be removed.

Linux-Ubuntu
============
 1. cd ${WORKSPACE}
 2. . CommandScripts/LinuxTools/SetLinuxEnv.sh
 3. cd ~
 4. mkdir boost
 5. cd boost
 6. tar -xvjf ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_HOME}/boost/boost_1_68_0.tar.bz2
 7. sudo mkdir /usr/local/include/boost
 8. cd boost_1_68_0
 9. sudo rsync -rlptDWv boost/ /usr/local/include/boost/
10. ./bootstrap.sh --with-libraries=date_time,regex,system,log
11. ./b2 variant=release link=shared threading=multi
12. cp stage/lib/libboost*.so.1.68.0 ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_LIB_PATH_RELEASE}
13. Add/update the new library files in to the TFS.
14. The local ~/boost directory can now be removed.

Windows
=======
1. Run the 7-Zip archiver as administrator.
2. Unzip the latest 7-Zip Boost archive in CommonSDK\source\ThirdParty\Boost to
   C:\Program Files\boost (e.g. resulting in the creation of the    C:\Program Files\boost\boost_1_68_0 directory.)
3. Run cmd.exe as an administrator.
4. cd "\Program Files\boost\boost_1_68_0"
5. bootstrap
6. b2 date_time system log log_setup variant=debug variant=release debug-symbols=on
7. The boost system library files are now in:
   C:\Program Files\boost\boost_1_68_0\bin.v2\libs
   
!! The following steps are only needed when updating the project to a new boost version !!
   
8. Run CopyBinaries.bat to Copy the dll, lib, and pdb files from the appropriate directories above to:
   CommonSDK\source\ThirdParty\lib\WinHost\Debug
   CommonSDK\source\ThirdParty\lib\WinHost\Release
9. Add and commit the new files in %COMMON_THIRDPARTY_HOME% to the Common ThirdParty repository.
